entry.def: Coptic means belonging or relating to a part of the Christian Church which was started in Egypt.

example.ex: The Coptic Church is among the oldest churches of Christianity.
example.tran: 科普特教会是最古老的基督教会之一。

means.word_mean: 1. the liturgical language of the Coptic Church used in Egypt and Ethiopia; written in the Greek alphabet
1. of or relating to the Copts or their church or language or art;
